p: The NYC M2M study was approved by the Institutional Review Board (IRB) of the New York Blood Center, and this identity unlinked substudy was also approved by the New York Blood Center IRB. No new samples or behavioral data were acquired for this substudy. All laboratory testing was performed in a research laboratory incapable of releasing results to patients or clinicians. All participants in the NYC M2M study were contacted by study staff upon completion of laboratory analyses with a summary of study findings and referral to various clinics in NYC for clinical HCV testing and medical management as needed.
